name: Isaac VS Ivan
description:
A tale as old as man himself – the conquest for glory, the path of respect. All the finer things in life. But today, two gentlemen stand at the precipice of PROGRESS!

Duel your friends to the death in the shoes of ISAAC NEXT COOPER and IVAN HUMPHREY BUCKET – both arduous members of their political parties, their differing views have caused the country itself to stir with conflict. And now, the League of Nations has stepped in – for Isaac and Ivan must do battle till DEATH do their rivalry apart, to once and for all achieve world peace.

Enjoy this 1v1 Steampunk inspired car battle arena, local multiplayer PvP experience. You play as a gentleman with a blue tophat (Isaac) or a red tophat (Ivan). And you have mighty weaponry at your disposal. Shoot good and don't fall okay :)

CONTROLS: 

This game is ONLY intended for 1v1 controller based combat. As such, controls will NOT work on keyboard. See below for the game's full controlscheme:

WEAPONRY, MACHINERY, TOOLS OF DESTRUCTION. THIS, TOO, A GENTLEMAN NEEDS AND DESIRES...

MUSIC BY: Havdreng linktr.ee/havdreng
